content: It's been great! The Kryptonite U-Lock is really easy to use and transport. The lock itself is pretty compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around in my backpack or attach to my bike. The locking mechanism is also really smooth and easy to operate. I've had no issues with it so far, and it gives me a lot of peace of mind when I'm locking up my bike. Plus, it's been getting a lot of use lately since I've been doing more road rides on my Trek Emonda. Speaking of which, I'm really excited for that charity ride coming up - 40 miles should be a great challenge!
